column4: hi. can someone tell me when pidgin will get added to the ubuntu repos?
i'm not sure, but you can build it from source. i'm running it.
that i do not want to do. I won't be able to upgrade using apt then (or will I?)
apt may want to "upgrade" your custom install by replacing it once it appears in the repository if you use checkinstall and give it the same name as it will appear in the repository...i think.
